channel.title: 2018-2019s on Bloomington Playwrights Project
channel.description: Recent content in 2018-2019s on Bloomington Playwrights Project

item.title: BPP's 40th Birthday Celebration
item.description: This June 6th, we are throwing ourselves a 40th Birthday Celebration! Start the night out at 6:30 with donated food, wine, and beer! Then move into the theatre for the announcement of our 2019-2020 Season and a staged read of the 2014 SMASH HIT Kalamazoo. Join the original cast and relive the wonderful story of BPP’s best selling show of all time. Then stick around for the announcement of the 2019-20 Season (our 40th!

item.title: Ike & Julie Arnove PlayOffs
item.description: Batter up for the Ike & Julie Arnove PlayOffs! It’s almost that time of year again when we separate the contenders from the pretenders, the pros from the joes, the heroes from the zeros. Yes, thatâ€™s right - the baseball playoffs are just around the corner. In celebration, the BPP is presenting its most electrifying, action-packed, and anticipated fundraising event of the year, the Ike & Julie Arnove PlayOffs! Just what are The PlayOffs, you ask?

item.title: On Your Marc
item.description: Do you remember back in 2016 when beloved TV icon, Marc Summers, premiered his one-man show Everything in Its Place: The Life and Slimes of Marc Summers at BPP? We sure do. Well, while that was going on, a documentary crew was filming. Fast forward 2 years… Surprise! Marc is joining us again this fall for a sneak preview screening of the completed film! On Your Marc intimately captures his life, career, and legacy.
